info.name: Matcha Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for Matcha backend - all modules and endpoints

item.name: Storage

exec: // Save uploaded url to use in create post/comment bodies
if (res && res.ok && res.data && res.data.url) { pm.collectionVariables.set('uploadedUrl', res.data.url); }

item.description: Storage signing and proxy endpoints

item.name: Health & Status
item.description: Operational endpoints to check service health, readiness for dependencies, and basic metrics. Useful for monitoring and troubleshooting.

item.name: Social

query.description: Number of posts to return (default: 20, max: 100)

request.description:
Get posts from a specific user. Respects privacy settings:
- Public profiles: Anyone can access
- Private profiles: Only followers can access
- Users can always access their own posts

item.description: Social endpoints including follow system and user profile access. Use these to follow/unfollow users, fetch followers/following lists, and access user posts with privacy controls.

item.name: Authentication

exec: pm.test('Login sets httpOnly refreshToken cookie', function () {

item.description: Auth lifecycle including email/password registration, login, OAuth providers, and multi-factor operations.

item.name: User Profile
item.description: User profile management and email verification.

item.name: Public User Profiles
item.description: Public user profile endpoints with privacy settings. These endpoints respect user privacy settings and return appropriate messages when data is private.

item.name: Devices
item.description: Manage the current device for notifications and sessions. Unified manage endpoint supports register/list/revoke.

item.name: Sessions
item.description: User sessions listing (placeholder). Future improvements will expose active sessions.

item.name: Communities
item.description: Community CRUD and membership. Use toggle-membership for a single endpoint to join or leave.

item.name: Posts

formdata.value: This post has an image uploaded directly

request.description: Unified vote endpoint for posts and comments. Body: entityType: 'post'|'comment', entityId: '<id>', value: -1|0|1
Vote on a specific post. Body: { value: -1|0|1 }

item.description: Public and community posts. Unified endpoints for voting and save toggling simplify integration.

item.name: Comments

request.description: Get all comments for a specific post. Supports sorting and pagination.
Create a new comment for a specific post. Uses a URL in media array.

formdata.value: This is my comment with a direct image upload

request.description: Create a new comment and upload a file directly in the body.
Create a reply to an existing comment. The parentId should be the ID of the comment you're replying to.
Get a specific comment by its ID.
Update a comment. Only the author can edit their own comment.
Delete a comment. Only the author, post owner, or moderators can delete comments.
Vote on a comment. Body: { value: -1|0|1 } where 1=upvote, -1=downvote, 0=remove.
Get a comment and all its replies (thread).
Get statistics for a specific comment.

item.description: Post-specific comment CRUD and related info (threads, stats). All comment operations are scoped to specific posts with realtime WebSocket support.

item.name: Reports
item.description: User-facing reports across surfaces (feed, chat, men). Use unified creation endpoint to report any entity.

item.name: Admin
item.description: Moderator/Admin tools. Unified user action endpoint covers ban/unban/shadowban/logout-all in one route.

item.name: Men Reviews
item.description: Men Reviews module: create and vote on reviews (red/green/unknown), threaded comments, and aggregation.

item.name: Feed
item.description: Home and saved feeds.

item.name: Chat
Conversations
item.description: Conversation management endpoints

item.name: Messages
item.description: Message operations including send, edit, delete, and reactions

item.name: Unified Chat Operations
item.description: Unified chat operations for mobile convenience

item.name: Presence & Typing
item.description: Presence and typing indicators

item.name: Blocks
item.description: User blocking functionality

item.name: Reports
item.description: Chat-specific reporting functionality
Complete chat system including conversations, messages, unified operations, presence, blocks, and reports.

item.name: Search

query.description: Content type filter (posts, communities, users, all)
Comma-separated list of content types to search

item.description: Global search functionality across all content types including posts, users, communities, and men reviews.
